title: BBC Local Live: Devon and Cornwall on Wednesday 27 December 2017 - BBC News
summary: crash driver returns shoe to injured boy .
man , 24 , fighting for life after bike crash .
a30 closed after parts of roof blow off .
police advise public to delay journeys .
more news , sport , travel and weather from 07:00 on thursday 28 december 2017 .

documents.title: our live coverage
text: our coverage for devon and cornwall has finished for today .
we 'll be back on thursday from 07:00 with all the latest news , sport , travel and weather .
do n't forget bbc spotlight is on bbc one this evening .
author: Amy Gladwell
BBC News Online

documents.title: cold night with widespread frost
text: it will be a cold night , with a widespread frost , the showers will die out and the wind will continue to ease .
minimum temperature : -2c
the met office has issued a yellow weather warning for ice for devon and cornwall until 12:00 tomorrow .
it will be a chilly and dry start to thursday with sunny spells for much of the day .
maximum temperature : 6c
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: police appeal after woman aged 26 reported missing from hospital in torquay
text: police issued an appeal for help to find a woman missing from hospital .
author: Devon Live

documents.title: toilets reborn
text: two sets of public toilets in devon have been converted into seaside businesses .
the buildings in dawlish warren and holcombe , have found new leases of life - one as a bike hire business and cafe , and the other as a snack kiosk .
it 's after teignbridge council decided to transfer or dispose of 17 of its toilet facilities four years ago .
author: BBC Radio Devon

documents.title: rspca applauds government crackdown on illegal puppy trade as several complaints were made in cornwall in 2017
text: a crackdown on english dog breeders who put profits ahead of animal health has been announced , as scores of concerned calls to the rspca were made in cornwall this year .
author: Cornwall Live

documents.title: driver rescued from flood water
text: drivers are being warned to avoid going through flood water after firefighters rescued a woman in east devon .
the car was recovered after getting stuck near kilmington this morning .
the water was several feet deep following heavy rain overnight .
devon fire and rescue service says motorists often underestimate how deep the water is .
just along here you can see there are two field entrances .
we 've been here before when the river 's actually going through entrance to entrance and can sweep you off your feet quite easily
author: BBC Spotlight

documents.title: diseased trees replaced
text: work will begin early in 2018 to replant thousands of trees in ancient woodlands which had to be chopped down because of disease .

local people were horrified when the felling took place nine months ago at ball copse and the grove in churston in torbay under orders from the forestry commission , which says it had to be done to prevent it spreading further .
it says 3,500 trees will be replanted and that the new ones will be `` much better '' .
author: BBC Spotlight

documents.title: elderly pedestrian hurt after being hit by van in paignton
text: an elderly man has been hurt after being hit by a van in paignton .
author: Devon Live

documents.title: police investigate hotel assault
text: police are appealing for witnesses to an assault that happened at a hotel in wadebridge earlier this month .
two men were assaulted by a man they did n't know between 22:00 and midnight on friday 15 december at the swan hotel .
on of the men suffered a fractured jaw and was taken to hospital for surgery while the second victim was left with visible facial injuries .
dc jen macdonald said : `` this incident took place in a public bar so i am confident that there would have been eye witnesses to the assault . ''
author: Amy Gladwell
BBC News Online

documents.title: fund set up for family of tragic totnes crash victim reuben tops £ 10,000
text: an appeal to raise funds for a family devastated by the death of their three year-old-son in a devon crash before christmas has topped more than £ 10,000 .
author: Devon Live

documents.title: car trapped by floods in cornwall pulled from water by fire engine
text: a car became stuck when it drove into flood water that came up to the doors , in carnhell green .
author: Cornwall Live

documents.title: a30 closed for roof repair
text: the a30 remains closed in both directions at hayle after part of the boots ' store roof was blown off at the west cornwall shopping park .
cornwall fire and rescue service has been removing loose panels and structural engineers are due to assess the safety of the building .
this is the scene beside the # a30 at # hayle @ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid - the road will remain closed until the building is deemed safe and stable
when is this likely to re-open do you have any idea time wise ?
author: BBC Radio Cornwall

documents.title: man , 24 , fighting for life after bike crash
text: a 24-year-old man has been left with life-threatening injuries following a serious collision involving a motorbike on the a388 at saltash .
the single-vehicle collision happened on the evening of friday 22 december at the entrance to carkeel barns .
the kawasaki motorcycle was travelling from callington towards the direction of saltash .
police are appealing for witnesses to the collision or anyone who saw the motorbike before it happened , as well as any dash-cam footage .
author: Amy Gladwell
BBC News Online

documents.title: an icy night ahead
text: a yellow weather warning has been issued for ice for devon and cornwall between 15:00 today and 12:00 on thursday .
icy patches are expected to develop on some untreated roads , pavements and cycle paths , as well as where showers continue to fall washing off treatment .
some injuries from slips and falls on icy surfaces are possible .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: police advise public to delay journeys if possible
text: strong winds and heavy rain overnight have caused several problems on the roads across devon and cornwall today .
in cornwall :
the a30 was closed for several hours near victoria services following a serious accident involving an ambulance in the early hours .
the road is still shut at the loggans moor roundabout in hayle after part of the roof of the nearby retail park became loose .
in devon :
the county council have advised caution to drivers after reports of accidents and standing water and debris on the roads .
sgt olly taylor from devon and cornwall police said it has been a `` challenging morning '' and conditions were unlikely to improve .
looking ahead during the day today , i do n't think the weather conditions are due to get much better .
so if people can delay their journeys , i 'd certainly advise people do for the time being .
if people have to go out , just bear in mind the weather can hit very quickly and unexpectedly . ''
author: Rob England
BBC News Online

documents.title: man arrested after being pulled from sea
text: police were called to reports of a man crashing a car and subsequently jumping into the sea in penzance .
officers said they were called just before midnight on christmas day near chyandour cliff .
rnli volunteers from newlyn also attended to search the shoreline after the man was located by police .
he was taken by emergency services to royal cornwall hospital in treliske .
police said a 26-year-old man was later arrested on sus of driving under the influence of alcohol , and has since been released `` pending further enquiries '' .
author: Rob England
BBC News Online

documents.title: large tree removed from road
text: a large tree has been removed from the road in st austell this morning after the stormy weather overnight .
great work by the team removing large tree which had blocked access on porthpean road # staustell for several hours .
@ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid
author: BBC Radio Cornwall

documents.title: christmas appeal to find new home for 'grieving ' dog cassie who lost her owner
text: a special christmas appeal has been launched in the hopes of finding a new home for a grieving '' dog that lost its owner .
author: Cornwall Live

documents.title: missing person found on wintery dartmoor
text: a missing person has been found on snowy dartmoor , the national police air service says .
police helicopter located a high risk missing person this morning on snowy # dartmoor .
safe and well but unable to call home .
log 187 @ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid
well done a team ( +1 ) !
thank you !
# teamworkworks
author: Twitter

documents.title: more than 350 homes left without electricity after power cuts across cornwall this morning
text: more than 350 homes have been left without electricity this morning after power cuts across cornwall today .
author: Cornwall Live

documents.title: crash driver returns shoe to injured boy
text: a driver who hit a teenage boy returned his shoe to him before driving off .
the 13-year-old boy suffered a fractured arm and dislocated shoulder when he was hit by a car in plymouth , devon .
police say the male driver stopped , got out of his car and up the boy 's shoe and returned it to him , then drove off without saying anything .
the boy , from plymouth , also suffered a dislocated shoulder and was taken to derriford hospital .
officers are appealing for witnesses and say the car in question was either a silver or blue vw golf or a blue corsa .
the windscreen was heavily damaged in the incident .
a police spokesperson said the man is described as `` white , aged 30 to 40 , with blond/brown wavy hair to the ears and a beard '' .
author: Amy Gladwell
BBC News Online

documents.title: dartmoor residents wake up to a winter wonderland as uk hit by heavy snow
text: some residents in dartmoor have woken up to to a winter wonderland this morning , as heavy snow is causing chaos across large swathes of the uk .
author: Plymouth Herald

documents.title: latest travel for cornwall
text: latest travel for cornwall
author: BBC News Travel

documents.title: 'roof in the road ' at a30 , hayle
text: the a30 has been closed in both directions near hayle due to part of a roof falling off from the west cornwall shopping park between loggans moor roundabout and st erth roundabout .

documents.title: snow in parts of devon and cornwall
text: there are reports of snow in parts of cornwall and devon this morning .
there is reportedly a covering in areas of dartmoor , liskeard and bugle near st austell , where @ twitterid took this
author: Amy Gladwell
BBC News Online

documents.title: blocked roads and power cuts
text: there are warnings of disruption around devon and cornwall after a stormy night with debris and standing water affecting several roads .

trees are reportedly blocking passage lane in fowey and the b3266 between st mabyn and camelford , while another fallen tree broke an overhead power cable in mitchell leaving several homes without electricity .
there are also power cuts in hayle , shortlanesend , gweek , st keverne , perranzabuloe and trewithian .
a window was blown out at a residential care home in newquay overnight and a resident was moved to a safer area , fire crews said .
author: Amy Gladwell
BBC News Online

documents.title: travel news : section of a30 closed
text: cornwall
devon

documents.title: three injured in flat fire
text: three people have been treated for the effects of breathing in smoke after a flat fire in the bideford area .
fire crews say it broke out on the ground floor of a block on union close , just before 02:00 .
a man and two women were helped to get out out by fire crews from the town and from torrington , devon fire and rescue service said .
it was started by accident by smoking equipment and the room where it happened was `` severely damaged , '' a spokesperson said .
other flats and communal areas were also reportedly affected .
author: Amy Gladwell
BBC News Online

documents.title: colder with sunny spells and scattered showers
text: cold northerly winds will bring sunny spells and scattered showers , these likely to be wintry and persistent over bodmin moor and dartmoor , but with drier weather likely towards penzance , and showers easing towards evening .
winds will ease later .
maximum temperature : 8c ( 46f )
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: a30 shut after crash
text: the a30 in cornwall is closed eastbound near victoria after a one-vehicle crash .
the collision happened shortly after 05:00 and three people were inside the vehicle , police said .
their condition is not known .
all three emergency services attended .
author: Amy Gladwell
BBC News Online

documents.title: news , sport , travel and weather for the channel islands
text: welcome to bbc local live in devon & cornwall .
we 'll be bringing you all the day 's news , sport , weather and travel and if you have a story email us .
author: Amy Gladwell
BBC News Online
